title: `transmute_from_fn_item_types` not being suppressed by `--cap-lints`
body:
I see this output in a recent build

```
   Compiling term v0.2.14
   Compiling solicit v0.4.4
/home/brian/.cargo/registry/src/github.com-88ac128001ac3a9a/openssl-0.7.6/src/ssl/mod.rs:572:38: 572:52 warning: `extern "C" fn(*mut libc::c_void, &mut i32, *mut libc::c_void) -> i32 {ssl::raw_sni}` is now zero-sized and has to be cast to a pointer before transmuting to `extern "C" fn()`, #[warn(transmute_from_fn_item_types)] on by default
/home/brian/.cargo/registry/src/github.com-88ac128001ac3a9a/openssl-0.7.6/src/ssl/mod.rs:572             let f: extern "C" fn() = mem::transmute(raw_sni);
                                                                                                                                  ^~~~~~~~~~~~~~
/home/brian/.cargo/registry/src/github.com-88ac128001ac3a9a/openssl-0.7.6/src/ssl/mod.rs:572:38: 572:52 warning: this was previously accepted by the compiler but is being phased out; it will become a hard error in a future release!
/home/brian/.cargo/registry/src/github.com-88ac128001ac3a9a/openssl-0.7.6/src/ssl/mod.rs:572:38: 572:52 note: for more information, see issue #19925 <https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/19925>
/home/brian/.cargo/registry/src/github.com-88ac128001ac3a9a/openssl-0.7.6/src/ssl/mod.rs:589:38: 589:52 warning: `extern "C" fn(*mut libc::c_void, &mut i32, *mut libc::c_void) -> i32 {ssl::raw_sni_with_data::<isize>}` is now zero-sized and has to be cast to a pointer before transmuting to `extern "C" fn()`, #[warn(transmute_from_fn_item_types)] on by default
/home/brian/.cargo/registry/src/github.com-88ac128001ac3a9a/openssl-0.7.6/src/ssl/mod.rs:589             let f: extern "C" fn() = mem::transmute(raw_sni_with_data::<T>);
                                                                                                                                  ^~~~~~~~~~~~~~
/home/brian/.cargo/registry/src/github.com-88ac128001ac3a9a/openssl-0.7.6/src/ssl/mod.rs:589:38: 589:52 warning: this was previously accepted by the compiler but is being phased out; it will become a hard error in a future release!
/home/brian/.cargo/registry/src/github.com-88ac128001ac3a9a/openssl-0.7.6/src/ssl/mod.rs:589:38: 589:52 note: for more information, see issue #19925 <https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/19925>
```
